alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 13 at 9:17AM AKDT until October 13 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, Situk River near Yakutat, along the Northeast Gulf Coast. * WHEN...Until 545 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 916 AM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing. Between 3 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Yakutat is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - If you live near or along Situk River stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
